amendatorysection.catchline: Transfer to State Park Cash Revolving Fund.
amendatorysection.para: The State Treasurer, at the direction of the budget administrator of the budget division of the Department of Administrative Services, shall transfer $1,000,000 from the State Recreation Road Fund to the State Park Cash Revolving Fund between July 1, 2015, and July 31, 2015. The State Treasurer, at the direction of the budget administrator of the budget division of the Department of Administrative Services, shall transfer $1,000,000 from the State Recreation Road Fund to the State Park Cash Revolving Fund between July 1, 2016, and July 31, 2016.
